questions.question: What types of furniture do you offer?
questions.answer: We offer a wide range of furniture for every room in your home or office, including modular furniture (i.e. kitchen, wardrobes, vanity, tv cabinets), living room sets, dining tables, bedroom furniture, office desks, panelling and custom pieces.

questions.question: Do you offer custom furniture?
questions.answer: Yes, we specialize in creating custom furniture tailored to your specific needs. Whether you’re looking for a unique design, specific dimensions, or particular materials, our team can work with you to bring your vision to life.

questions.question: How do I place an order?
questions.answer: You can place an enquiry through our website or by contacting our customer service team. Simply choose the product you like, customize it if desired, and follow the checkout process. For custom orders, please reach out to us for a consultation.

questions.question: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.answer: We accept a variety of payment methods, including major credit cards, debit cards, UPI and bank transfers. All transactions are secure and encrypted for your safety.

questions.question: Do you offer financing options?
questions.answer: Financing of your furniture is in the customer’s scope. You can work with your preferred bank or financial institution to secure a loan or financing plan that best suits your budget. Many banks offer personal loans or lines of credit that can be used for purchasing furniture.

questions.question: What is your return policy?
questions.answer: We offer a 30-day return policy for standard items, provided they are in their original condition and packaging. Custom orders and special items are final sale and cannot be returned. For more details, please see our Return Policy section.

questions.question: How long does delivery take?
questions.answer: Delivery times vary depending on the product and your location. Standard items are typically delivered within 2-4 weeks, while custom pieces may take longer. We will provide an estimated delivery date when you place your order.

questions.question: Do you offer international shipping?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer international shipping. Please contact us for a custom quote based on your location and the items you wish to purchase.

questions.question: Can I track my order?
questions.answer: Yes, once your order has shipped, we will send you a tracking number so you can monitor its progress. You can also log into your account on our website to view your order status.

questions.question: What if my furniture arrives damaged?
questions.answer: If your furniture arrives damaged, please notify us immediately. We will work with you to repair, replace, or return the item at no additional cost. Please keep all packaging materials until the issue is resolved.

questions.question: How do I care for my furniture?
questions.answer: We provide care instructions for each product to help you maintain its beauty and durability. General tips include regular dusting, avoiding direct sunlight, and using coasters or placemats to protect surfaces. For specific care guidelines, please refer to the product page or contact us.

questions.question: Do you offer assembly services?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer white-glove delivery service, which includes assembly and placement of your furniture in your desired location. Our team will ensure everything is set up to your satisfaction.

questions.question: How can I experience the quality of the product?
questions.answer: We offer a service where our executive can visit your location with samples of some furniture. This allows you to experience the quality, craftsmanship, and materials firsthand before making a purchase decision. We believe that seeing and touching our products will help you appreciate the standards we maintain.

questions.question: How do I contact customer service?
questions.answer: Our customer service team is available to assist you with any questions or concerns. You can reach us via email at [Your Email Address], by phone at [Your Phone Number], or through the contact form on our website.
